page.name: Activity: Sample partner outreach email template
page.content:
Once you have developed a strong value proposition, you may wish to use this email template below to help you craft a compelling outreach message. Try to keep this short and simple with a clear call to action, such as setting up a phone call or meeting. This template is intended as a starting point, and you should tailor this to each potential partner. 

Dear [contactâ€™s name],

My organization is developing a new pre-apprenticeship program and would like to gather [partner organization name] input on our program design. [One or two sentences about your program and why they would be a good potential partner].

[One or two-sentence value proposition]. I have attached a [file type] to share more about our [name of organization] and our pre-apprenticeship program. 

We hope to create a program of strong candidates to apply to [partner organization name] and would greatly appreciate your guidance to achieve that. Are you free for a 30-minute call to discuss this further?

Many thanks,

[Your name, title, organization]
